name: Kukui (itch)
description: Kukui is about a 10-year-old boy that is going through trauma, Kyle wasn’t always a troubled kid, shortly after he reached the age of 10 he started developing a rare brain dysfunction that made him see things that are not from this world. Shortly after suffering an accident, Kyle was put into a coma that left him paralyzed and unable to move. Luckily his brain is still functioning and he is able to access it and relive it all again and be able to understand how he got hurt.
